application_details: request a decision of the Minister regarding the NPAs
evidence_assessment: failed to act within the 90-day period
did not demonstrate inability to act or instruct another person
lacked a bona fide intention to request a decision
decision_reasoning: does not meet the criteria under subsection 129.2(4)
it would not be just and equitable to grant the application
procedure_followed: Applicant sought an extension of time through administrative and judicial processes after missing the initial deadline
